import React from 'react' import {FaCodepen, FaStore, FaUserFriends,FaUsers} from 'react-icons/fa' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Spin from '../components/layout/Spin' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import {useEffect, useContext} from 'react' import GithubContext from '../context/GithubContext' // w-full is full width, mx-auto is margin auto, lg:w-10/12 is 10/12 of the width lg is large screen // mb-4 is margin bottom 4 function User() { const params=useParams() const {getUser, user,loading} = useContext(GithubContext) useEffect(() => { getUser(params.login) } , []) const {login, avatar_url, html_url, name, company, blog, location, email, bio, public_repos, public_gists, followers, following, created_at,hireable} = user if(loading) return return ( <>
Back To Search

{name}

{login}

{name}

{type}
) } export default User
